title: Ignite Blood
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Blood spilled in your [[LOS]] has a 33% chance to immediately burst into a [[cloud]] of [[flame]].
You are immune to clouds of flame.||Your demonic aura sometimes causes spilled blood to erupt in flames. |- |2||Chance of igniting blood increased to 66%. Flame cloud duration improves.|| Your demonic aura often causes spilled blood to erupt in flames. |- |3||Chance of igniting blood increased to 100%. Flame cloud duration improves.||Your demonic aura causes all spilled blood to erupt in flames. |- | colspan="3" | Flame clouds appear where player or enemy blood is spilled and last from mutlevel + 2 to 3 * mutlevel + 1 turns. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good mutation]], [[Demonspawn mutation]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.27]], rank 1 granted rF+, and rank 2 granted flame cloud immunity. *Prior to [[0.15]], rank 1 granted [[scroll]] [[conservation]], and rank 2 granted rF+.
